definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:EffetDemon</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:MonstreDemon</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_remove_specific_potion_effect"><field name="potion">REGENERATION</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_exhaustion"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_deal_custom_damage"><value name="damage_number"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="localization_text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">poison_de_glycine</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
